storyInfo: Horn saves the prisoners, and Mandragora extracts the Taran spy. W is seriously injured by Hoederer before being rescued by Ascalon.

attributes.content: Didn't think I would ever see you surprised like this.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I gave you a hint, after all.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: That rock? Very funny.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I thought...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Who did you think would come? Manfred?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I'm thinking Theresis must be getting senile if he let you live. You even get to roam around Londinium like this?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I thought you guys were long dead, since I haven't heard anything from you in ages.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Well... you know what they say about assuming? See, you were right. I've become sentimental, almost forgot we're mercs.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Your detonator hand slowed down, W.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: And your hand isn't trembling this time.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: What about those mercenaries you brought from Reunion? Did you really come alone?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Why would I bring them? So that they could get bought out by the Regent, like you?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Looks like you care about them. No wonder I didn't see any familiar faces.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Speak for yourself. I saw lots of old friends in Londinium.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You really like headhunting under my nose, don't you?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Let me guess, Schwab is dead, isn't he? You killed him, didn't you, Hoederer? He knew you longer than he knew me, right?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Did your hand tremble when you killed an old friend? One who carried you on his back for an entire day, dodging dozens of Theresis's killers?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're remembering it wrong. He was gone by the Battle for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Alright, you've always had a better memory than me for the people we fought with.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I've always wanted to ask... does it make you feel better to remember the dead?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I don't think so. I can see it in your eyes. Your dreams haunt you now more than ever.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I've known you for as long as you've known me.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You're only trying to hide your own feelings when move to provoke me like that.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Ha, like you'd know.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: In the old days, you would have thrown out those useless resistance fighters as bait.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: If someone told me that W volunteered to be the rear guard, I would have told them to find a funnier joke.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Did your time in Chernobog drive you mad, W?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Did Talulah burn your brains out, or are you seeing the shadows of the dead?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: The mad never admit their madness, right? How do you know I'm the one who's mad?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Schwab's head isn't enough to buy Theresis's trust. What was the price you had to pay?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Could it have been her? Don't tell me...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Don't even say it.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Oh? There's a reaction.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: We've done all we could.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You were too slow, W.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Did I hear that right? Are you looking for an excuse for your screw-ups? Who was it who told me he had a plan for everything?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: When do you think I lost my eye?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You don't mean that Ines...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Yes, she's dead.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Again?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm not...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Mercenaries pay a price for breaching trust. I've paid mine.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: We're out.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We've been lucky, haven't we?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: The Sarkaz got drawn to the explosions in the south. The ones guarding the interrogation room got taken out by Dublinn.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Nothing good comes of relying on luck in battle.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Ha. Did you think you would have lived this long, if not for lady luck?
W-Who's she? Did they escape from the interrogation room too? Are they friends?
attributes.name: Prisoner

attributes.content: Enemies.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: (Aim.)
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: (But hold your fire.)
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Can't talk without your crossbow raised, soldier? Don't think I didn't know you only got out by following us.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: You want me to thank you? Then you'd better take a trip with me to the hardest prison in Londinium.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: I'll give you credit.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: You're not like the nobles that seep oil from every pore.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: They're the ones who kneel before anyone to cling to their way of life. Sarkaz or Dublinn... it makes no difference to them.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: You, though... you just won't give up. You're like flies, getting in my way no matter where I go.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: That's my line.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Why you...!
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: *Cough* *cough* Mandragora...
Your friend's in pretty bad shape.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Same to those soldiers behind you.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Looks like we're both in a hurry.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: It's a shame that I don't have time for you today.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Suits me just fine.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Make way.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Let's go.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: By the way, soldier—
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You had better not die at the hands of the Sarkaz...
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Before I have the chance to impale you with my rock.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: Whew... they're gone.
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Good. Save your ammo for the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Do you mean...?
attributes.name: Robben

attributes.content: Don't you think it's too easy?
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Whoever Dublinn took from the interrogation room, I doubt the Sarkaz would let them go so easily.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Or us, for that matter.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Do you have everyone, Lady Heidi?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Yes, Amiya. They're all here.
attributes.name: Heidi

attributes.content: Careful!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Let the weakest go first. We'll take care of any pursuing mercenaries.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Feist, can you still fight?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Of course.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: Hang on tight, Bill. Things could get bumpy.
attributes.name: Feist

attributes.content: More enemies ahead! They must have come in from another entrance!
attributes.name: Closure

attributes.content: Target found!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Over here! Get them!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hey, don't run too fast. Got to keep a pair of eyes in the back of your head when moving.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: A few got away.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Still not enough?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Get that caster first. Don't let him cast any Arts on our wounded.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Thank goodness you are back.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We aren't late to the party, are we?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Whew... Doctor, you didn't tell me there was only one fighter meeting up with us.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.options: One is enough.;There's more than one.

attributes.content: You know, Doctor, the more I learn about Rhodes Island, the more mysterious it seems.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: But at the end of the day, the most mysterious one is always you.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: You always have a card up your sleeve, don't you?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: On this point, we're the same.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: It looks like the Sarkaz have been drawn over here. But we didn't see many souls on the way.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: The ones holding off the enemies inside... I'm worried about them.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I'm worried about W...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: W? The one who made such an impression on all those operators at Chernobog?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Er, yeah.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Rhodes Island really IS filled with talent.
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: We have a... temporary understanding.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, I felt something eerie in her gaze when she said she was looking for Lady Heidi.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: What did you feel, Amiya?;Isn't she always like that?

attributes.content: Her emotions can be unusual, but there are times that she doesn't try to hide them. Her eyes don't lie at times like that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: The last time I saw that look from her was when she was yelling at me for the codes to stop the core city.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Is she still hiding something?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Ask her when she comes back.;She's W. She'll be back.

attributes.content: Alright... I trusted her once, I'll trust her again.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Huff... huff...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You're bleeding a lot.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You've got a few holes in you.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You should have hidden another bomb on yourself, like you used to. That way, you'd at least have a chance to take me down with you.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: *Cough*... Hoederer...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: How much is my head worth? Enough to buy a small house in Londinium?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Sorry, W. The Regent has better things to do than remember the name of a random merc.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Ha... did you say that to Ines too? Before she gave her life for your little dream?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Still talking big, eh?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: What were you expecting? A big laugh and a standing ovation for your dumb shit? No tears on my face, Hoederer. That's not like me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Who's the dumb one? You're on the ground, not me.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Like I said, I'm just... a little surprised.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So surprised you missed multiple chances to maim me?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Now that's not like you, W. What made you lose your cool?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Let's see... how about an old friend coming back from the dead and trying to put his sword through me?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I can believe that.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: W... who is this old friend you're talking about?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: That's what I don't like about you... You always think you can see right through me, same as her.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Too bad for you, I'm right again.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: It's been a while since you snuck into Londinium. There aren't too many distractions like this in here. What did you see in the city?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: You're the one following Theresis, not me. Have you not kowtowed to his traitor throne enough times? Still can't see through his tricks?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: So you knew.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Stop playing this game of you-know I-know. Look like a mercenary for once, Hoederer.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I can't let you leave here alive, W.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Of all the old friends that I've killed... you're probably the one who could best understand the choice I'm making.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Now who's indecisive?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I'm not taking my eyes off you. I want to see the Sarkaz who had the nerve to put his sword through me.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Alright then.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Goodbye, W.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: ...Huh?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Something deflected my sword... a dagger? Where did it come from?
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Don't move.
It's been a long time, Ascalon.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Hey...
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Same to you. Don't move.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: *Cough* Or what?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Wait, you came to save me, right?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Don't tell me you came to help him? Don't you know what Theresis did to her—
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Maybe work on your aim? I just barely dodged that, what with my injuries and all.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Too bad.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: You know you can't kill me now, right?
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: You've been my boss, and I've been yours. But there's someone here who's been boss to both of us. And she's clearly not in a good mood.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: I know. Our heads could drop off our shoulders at any moment.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: I have nothing else to say.
attributes.name: Hoederer

attributes.content: Each word will make you bleed a little faster.
attributes.name: Ascalon

attributes.content: I know, thanks for the concern.
attributes.name: W

attributes.content: Looks like you'll have to accept a little failure if you don't want to die here together, 'Captain' Hoederer.
attributes.name: W
